revised_title: The Life and Scientific Contributions of John Ernest Holloway
tldr: John Ernest Holloway was a remarkable man who devoted his life to both religious and scientific pursuits. He conducted extensive research on New Zealand flora, focusing on Lycopodium, Tmesipteris, and Hymenophyllaceae. Despite his busy life as a clergyman, Holloway managed to make significant contributions to the field of botany, using simple equipment and techniques. His work helped expand our understanding of New Zealand's unique plant species.
